4000.name: Rare Chest
4000.description: Receive some gold with a high chance of opening a rare quality weapon. Slim chance of opening a perk or epic quality weapon.

4001.name: Epic Chest
4001.description: Receive a moderate amount of gold with a high chance of opening an epic quality weapon and/or a perk. Slim chance of opening a legendary quality weapon.

4002.name: Legendary Chest
4002.description: Receive a large amount of gold with a high chance of opening a legendary quality weapon and/or a perk. Slim chance of opening an unreleased weapon.
